languages.text: {n}Пилот удивленно смотрит на вас, не понимая, откуда местная девица знает его имя. Впрочем, замешательство длится лишь мгновения — мрачно кивнув, он хватает вас под локоть и торопится вниз, к шаттлу.{/n}
languages.translation_comment: затемнение после куя, переход к сцене наверху

languages.text: {n}The pilot stares at you in bewilderment as he tries to fathom how a local stranger knows his name, but his confusion only lasts a moment. With a nod of grim determination, he grabs you by the elbow and hurries down the street with you toward the shuttle.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Пилот удивленно смотрит на вас, не понимая, откуда местная девица знает его имя. Впрочем, замешательство длится лишь мгновения — мрачно кивнув, он хватает вас под локоть и торопится вниз, к шаттлу.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The pilot stares at you in bewilderment, trying to understand how a local stranger knows his name, but his confusion only lasts a moment. With a nod of grim determination, he grabs you by the elbow and hurries down the street, toward the shuttle.{/n}

{n}The pilot stares at you in bewilderment as he tries to fathom how a local stranger knows his name, but his confusion only lasts a moment. With a nod of grim determination, he grabs you by the elbow and hurries down the street with you toward the shuttle.{/n}

{n}The guard takes a closer look at you and lowers his weapon.{/n} "Didn't recognise you under the grime. What, did the lord make you scrub out the stables again? And you've picked up a dog somewhere... Another one of his whims? I don't even want to know. Come in."

{n}The pilot stares at you in bewilderment as he tries to fathom how a local stranger knows his name, but his confusion only lasts a moment. With a nod of grim determination, he grabs you by the elbow and hurries down the street with you toward the shuttle.{/n}

{n}The pilot stares at you in bewilderment as he tries to fathom how a local stranger knows his name, but his confusion only lasts a moment. With a nod of grim determination, he grabs you by the elbow and hurries down the street with you toward the shuttle.{/n}

{n}The pilot stares at you in bewilderment, trying to understand how a local stranger knows his name, but his confusion only lasts a moment. With a nod of grim determination, he grabs you by the elbow and hurries down the street, toward the shuttle.{/n}

{n}The pilot stares at you in bewilderment as he tries to fathom how a local stranger knows his name, but his confusion only lasts a moment. With a nod of grim determination, he grabs you by the elbow and hurries down the street with you toward the shuttle.{/n}

languages.text: {n}驾驶员困惑地瞪着你，想弄清楚当地人究竟是怎么知道他的名字的，但没过多久，他目光中的困惑就烟消云散了。他坚定地点了点头，拉着你的胳膊，急匆匆地跑向穿梭机停靠的地方。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The pilot stares at you in bewilderment as he tries to fathom how a local stranger knows his name, but his confusion only lasts a moment. With a nod of grim determination, he grabs you by the elbow and hurries down the street with you toward the shuttle.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}驾驶员困惑地瞪着你，想弄清楚当地人究竟是怎么知道他的名字的，但没过多久，他目光中的困惑就烟消云散了。他坚定地点了点头，拉着你的胳膊，急匆匆地跑向穿梭机停靠的地方。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El piloto te mira perplejo, intentando imaginar cómo una lugareña a la que nunca ha visto conoce su nombre, pero su confusión es momentánea. Asintiendo con sombría determinación, te agarra del codo y corre calle abajo hacia la lanzadera.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The pilot stares at you in bewilderment as he tries to fathom how a local stranger knows his name, but his confusion only lasts a moment. With a nod of grim determination, he grabs you by the elbow and hurries down the street with you toward the shuttle.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El piloto te mira perplejo, intentando imaginar cómo una lugareña a la que nunca ha visto conoce su nombre, pero su confusión es momentánea. Asintiendo con sombría determinación, te agarra del codo y corre calle abajo hacia la lanzadera.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Gezegen sakini bir yabancının kendi adını nasıl bildiğini anlayamayan pilot, şaşkınlık sana baksa da bir an sonra şaşkınlığı geçiyor. Kararlı bir şekilde başını sallayıp seni kolundan tutuyor ve caddenin aşağısındaki mekiğe doğru aceleyle sürüklüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The pilot stares at you in bewilderment as he tries to fathom how a local stranger knows his name, but his confusion only lasts a moment. With a nod of grim determination, he grabs you by the elbow and hurries down the street with you toward the shuttle.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Gezegen sakini bir yabancının kendi adını nasıl bildiğini anlayamayan pilot, şaşkınlık sana baksa da bir an sonra şaşkınlığı geçiyor. Kararlı bir şekilde başını sallayıp seni kolundan tutuyor ve caddenin aşağısındaki mekiğe doğru aceleyle sürüklüyor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}パイロットは、地元の見知らぬ者がどうして自分の名前を知っているのかを理解しようとして、困惑した表情であなたを見つめたが、その困惑は一瞬で消えた。断固たる決心の頷きを返すと、あなたの肘を掴んでシャトルへ向かって共に通りを急いだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The pilot stares at you in bewilderment as he tries to fathom how a local stranger knows his name, but his confusion only lasts a moment. With a nod of grim determination, he grabs you by the elbow and hurries down the street with you toward the shuttle.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}パイロットは、地元の見知らぬ者がどうして自分の名前を知っているのかを理解しようとして、困惑した表情であなたを見つめたが、その困惑は一瞬で消えた。断固たる決心の頷きを返すと、あなたの肘を掴んでシャトルへ向かって共に通りを急いだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le pilote reste bouche bée en essayant de comprendre comment une inconnue a pu deviner son nom, mais il se reprend rapidement. Il vous adresse un hochement de tête déterminé, vous attrape par le bras et vous entraîne dans la rue afin de rejoindre la navette qui vous attend.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The pilot stares at you in bewilderment as he tries to fathom how a local stranger knows his name, but his confusion only lasts a moment. With a nod of grim determination, he grabs you by the elbow and hurries down the street with you toward the shuttle.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le pilote reste bouche bée en essayant de comprendre comment une inconnue a pu deviner son nom, mais il se reprend rapidement. Il vous adresse un hochement de tête déterminé, vous attrape par le bras et vous entraîne dans la rue afin de rejoindre la navette qui vous attend.{/n}

languages.translation_comment: затемнение после куя, переход к сцене наверху

languages.text: {n}Der Pilot starrt dich verwirrt an, als er sich fragt, woher {rt_mf|ein Fremder|eine Fremde} seinen Namen kennt, aber seine Verblüffung ist nur von kurzer Dauer. Mit einem entschlossenen Nicken packt er dich am Arm und läuft mir dir die Straße hinunter zu seinem Shuttle.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The pilot stares at you in bewilderment as he tries to fathom how a local stranger knows his name, but his confusion only lasts a moment. With a nod of grim determination, he grabs you by the elbow and hurries down the street with you toward the shuttle.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Pilot starrt dich verwirrt an, als er sich fragt, woher {mf|ein Fremder|eine Fremde} seinen Namen kennt, aber seine Verblüffung ist nur von kurzer Dauer. Mit einem entschlossenen Nicken packt er dich am Arm und läuft mir dir die Straße hinunter zu seinem Shuttle.{/n}
